communication_section.question_text: Does your child use at least two-word sentences consistently?
Can your child follow two-step directions without needing reminders?
Does your child ask questions using 'who,' 'what,' or 'where'?
Can your child name common objects like a ball or dog?
Does your child attempt to repeat words or phrases after hearing them?
Is your child understandable by people outside the family most of the time?
